title: A Discussion On Jewish Intelligence with Aaron Rabinowitz and Bo Winegard
description:
Just over a month ago an article by Bret Stephens entitled "The Secret to Jewish Genius" was released. It created quite the commotion on Twitter, so I decided to further investigate with these two lovely gentlemen: Aaron Rabinowitz and Bo Winegard. Both have different approaches to the topic and we explore the differences and similarities here

Podcast version can be found here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/A-Discussion-On-Jewish-Intelligence-with-Aaron-Rabinowitz-and-Bo-Winegard-eaurn8

Check out Aaron's podcast here: https://voidpod.com
Check out Bo's youtube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8mHb9VLBbrlvzRRwwGgL5w

Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
Email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com

Bret Stephens article: https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/27/opinion/jewish-culture-genius-iq.html
Charles Murray article: https://www.commentarymagazine.com/articles/jewish-genius/

#BretStephens #NewYorkTimes
